typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Ballot.Proposal storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: Create a new ballot with $(_numProposals) different proposals.

Give $(toVoter) the right to vote on this ballot.
 May only be called by $(chairperson).
nodes.name: giveRightToVote

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Ballot.Proposal storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: Delegate your vote to the voter $(to).
nodes.name: delegate

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Ballot.Proposal storage ref[] storage ref
struct Ballot.Proposal storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: Give a single vote to proposal $(toProposal).
nodes.name: vote

methods.constructor: Create a new ballot with $(_numProposals) different proposals.

delegate(address).notice: Delegate your vote to the voter $(to).

giveRightToVote(address).notice: Give $(toVoter) the right to vote on this ballot. May only be called by $(chairperson).

vote(uint8).notice: Give a single vote to proposal $(toProposal).
